meta.title: Inventing — Scale Up Without Hiring More
meta.description: We transform Excel chaos into smart systems for growing SMEs. Empower your staff, don't replace them. 0 upfront cost.

hero.headline: Scale Up Without Hiring More.
hero.subheadline: We turn manual Excel work into smart systems. Instead of spending months training new hires in old spreadsheets, we empower your existing team to handle twice the volume – with half the effort.
hero.visualBeforeNote: Excel Hell: One formula error away from a total shutdown.
hero.microProof: Specializing in mission-critical software for logistics, manufacturing, and service sectors.

excelHell.heading: Excel chaos is the bottleneck to your growth.
excelHell.copy: Growing SMEs often think they need more admin staff to handle the mess. But the problem isn't a lack of people – it's a lack of robust systems. We build the software that removes the manual friction slowing you down.

partnership.heading: We take the risk. You get the results.
partnership.description: Our model is built for long-term partnership. We cover the entire development cost – you only pay once the system delivers value.

extraction.title: 1) 0 Upfront Fee
extraction.body: We build at our own risk. If our solution doesn't solve your friction, you don't pay anything.

engineering.title: 2) Fixed Monthly Rate
engineering.body: Predictable like a salary, but cheaper. A fixed monthly cost covering hosting, support, and ongoing improvements.

optimization.title: 3) Scalable Growth
optimization.body: Once live, handle increased volumes without proportional increases in administrative headcount.

empowerTeam.heading: Empower your team, don't replace them.
empowerTeam.description: We don't build software to replace people; we build it to give them time for high-value work.

training.title: Eliminate Training Debt
training.body: New hires take months to learn "your way" of doing Excel. Our software is intuitive and guides them from day one.

value.title: Focus on High-Value Work
value.body: Let your team talk to customers and solve problems while our software handles the data logistics flawlessly.

reliability.title: Enterprise Reliability
reliability.body: Industrial-grade reliability. We build software that doesn't break, using principles from global industry leaders.

boring.heading: Reliable infrastructure, not AI hype.
boring.description: We don't sell trendy buzzwords. We build the "boring" but essential software that keeps your business running 24/7.

trust.heading: Expertise in industrial innovation.
trust.description: Our founder is an expert developer with a background in heavy industry. We know how to build systems that survive the real world.
trust.badgeLine: Subscription • No Upfront Cost • Industrial Standards
trust.micro: 15–30 min. No prep needed. Just straight talk.

diagnostic.heading: How much admin time are you wasting?
diagnostic.description: Answer three short questions. We'll turn it into a concrete ROI calculation for our discovery call.
diagnostic.cardDescription: No email required. Quick and anonymous.

q1.label: How many hours per week are spent on manual data entry?

q2.label: How many employees depend on Excel to do their jobs?

q3.label: What would it be worth to avoid hiring another admin role?

diagnostic.sideDescription: We'll follow up with a plan to eliminate your administrative debt.
diagnostic.sideBullet2: Proposal for a first module with immediate impact.
diagnostic.sideBullet3: Fixed monthly pricing with no hidden fees.
